title: Identify the x-intercept
text: Since the vertical lines cross the x-axis at $$x=-2$$ and at $$x=-5$$, we know the x-intercepts are $$(-2,0)$$ and $$(-5,0)$$.

title: Parallel Lines
text: Since their x-intercepts are different, the vertical lines are parallel.
